root:
SUBLIME2 com.sublimetext.2
Windows_VM Windows VM
World_of_Warcraft ^World of Warcraft$
Roccat_Lua 0x1e7d
Roccat_Lua 0x2c2e
Razer_Naga 0x1532
Razer_Naga 0x0040
XCELLON 0x12c9
XCELLON 0x1001
Internal_Keyboard 0x05ac
Internal_Keyboard 0x0273
Logitech_G710 0x046d
Logitech_G710 0xc24d s
Internal Keyboard Bindings
Command Click
osx.command_click OPTION_R = Command Click __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, PointingButton::LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R
Capslock Hack
osx.capslock_hack FN = Capslock (Internal Keyboard) __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::FN, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK
g710.capslock_hack CONTROL_L = Capslock (External Keyboard) DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK
Modifier Keys
osx.function CONTROL_L = Fn DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::FN
windows_vm.control_left Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard COMMAND_L = Left Control (Windows VM) __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::CONTROL_L
windows_vm.control_right Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard COMMAND_R = Right Control (Windows VM) __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::CONTROL_R
Screen Brightness
osx.screen_brightness_down DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard MISSION_CONTROL = Screen Brightness Down __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::MISSION_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_DOWN
osx.screen_brightness_up DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard LAUNCHPAD = Screen Brightness Up __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::LAUNCHPAD | ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_UP
Volume
osx.volume_mute MUSIC_PREV = Volume Mute DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_PREV, ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_MUTE
osx.volume_down MUSIC_PLAY = Volume Down DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_PLAY, ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_DOWN
osx.volume MUSIC_NEXT = Volume Up DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::MUSIC_NEXT, ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_UP
Launchpad
osx.launchpad Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard BRIGHTNESS_UP = Launchpad __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_UP, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::LAUNCHPAD
Mission Control
osx.mission_control OPTION_R = Mission Control DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::MISSION_CONTROL
Close Window (Cmd + w)
osx.close_window Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard SHIFT_R + OPTION_R = Close Window __SimultaneousKeyPresses__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::W, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
Next Window
osx.next_window Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard OPTION_R = Next Window __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::F4, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R
osx.next_window_shift Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard SHIFT_R + CURSOR_LEFT = Next Window __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::F4, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R
Next/Previous Tab
Chrome and Opera
osx.chrome_previous_tab Windows_VM GOOGLE_CHROME, OPERA DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard COMMAND_R + OPTION_R = Previous Tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
osx.chrome_next_tab Windows_VM GOOGLE_CHROME, OPERA DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard OPTION_R = Next Tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
Terminal
osx.terminal_previous_tab Windows_VM TERMINAL DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard COMMAND_R + OPTION_R = Previous Tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
osx.terminal_next_tab Windows_VM TERMINAL DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard OPTION_R = Next Tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
Safari
osx.safari_previous_tab Windows_VM SAFARI DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard COMMAND_R + OPTION_R = Previous Tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
osx.safari_next_tab Windows_VM SAFARI DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard OPTION_R = Next Tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
Sublime Text 2
osx.sublime_previous_tab Windows_VM SUBLIME2 DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard COMMAND_R + OPTION_R = Previous Tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
osx.sublime_next_tab Windows_VM SUBLIME2 DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard OPTION_R = Next Tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
Forward Delete
Backslash = Forward Delete osx.backslash_to_foward_delete DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::BACKSLASH, KeyCode::FORWARD_DELETE
Home/End
osx.home Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard Volume Mute = Command + Left Arrow (OSX Home) __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_MUTE, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
osx.end Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard Volume Down = Command + Right Arrow (OSX End) __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_DOWN, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
windows_vm.home Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard Volume Mute = Home (Windows VM) __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_MUTE, KeyCode::HOME
windows_vm.end Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard VOLUME_DOWN = End (Windows VM) __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_DOWN, KeyCode::END
Refresh/F5
osx.refresh Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard BRIGHTNESS_DOWN = Command + R (OSX) __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_DOWN, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
windows_vm.F5 Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard BRIGHTNESS_DOWN = F5 (Windows VM) __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_DOWN, KeyCode::F5
Rename (Windows VM only)
windows_vm.F2 Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Internal_Keyboard, DeviceProduct::Internal_Keyboard BRIGHTNESS_UP = F2 (Rename) __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_UP, KeyCode::F2
Logitech_G710
Windows VM
g710_windows_vm.alt Left Windows = Left Alt Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::OPTION_L
g710_windows_vm.left_control Left Alt = Left Control Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_L, KeyCode::CONTROL_R
g710_windows_vm.F5 Windows_VM Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 F1 = F5 (Refresh) __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F1, KeyCode::F5
OSX
g710_osx.left_option Left Windows = Left Option Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::OPTION_L
g710_osx.left_command Left Alt = Left Command Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L
g710_osx.right_command Right Alt = Right Command Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::COMMAND_R
g710_osx.F5 F1 = Refresh (Command + R) Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F1, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
g710_osx.next_window Right Windows = Next Window Windows_VM DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::F4, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R
g710_osx.right_alt PC Application Key = Mission Control DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::PC_APPLICATION, KeyCode::MISSION_CONTROL
g710_osx.home_end Home = Command + Left Arrow End = Command + Right Arrow DeviceVendor::Logitech_G710, DeviceProduct::Logitech_G710 Windows_VM __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::HOME, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::END, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
External Mouse
osx.mouse_scroll Force Mouse Scrolling to be Natural (Trackpad Is Still Inverted)
DeviceVendor::Razer_Naga, DeviceProduct::Razer_Naga, DeviceVendor::Roccat_Lua, DeviceProduct::Roccat_Lua, DeviceVendor::XCELLON, DeviceProduct::XCELLON
__FlipScrollWheel__ Option::FLIPSCROLLWHEEL_VERTICAL
Middle Click = Page Back osx.middle_click World_of_Warcraft
__KeyToKey__ PointingButton::MIDDLE, KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
osx.simultaneous_left_and_right_click Simultaneous L + R Click = Cmd + W World_of_Warcraft
__SimultaneousKeyPresses__ @begin PointingButton::LEFT, PointingButton::RIGHT, @end KeyCode::W, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
World_of_Warcraft
wow.trackpad Reverse Trackpad Scrolling Direction World_of_Warcraft __FlipScrollWheel__ Option::FLIPSCROLLWHEEL_VERTICAL
